childMarkdownRemark.html: Members of the Blankets for T.O. team helped with MP Shaun Chen's giveaway event to Scarborough North residents to celebrate Canada Day 2021!

imagePreview.description: Members of the Blankets for T.O. team with MP Shaun Chen, during his Canada Day Weekend Giveaway Drive-Thru on July 3rd, 2021.

node.title: Care Packages complete, MP honours Blankets for T.O.

childMarkdownRemark.html: During the Blankets for T.O. Care Package Event we gathered essential items to create personalized Care Package bags and donated them to local shelters. We also received a visit and a certificate from a local Member of Parliament!

imagePreview.description: Poster image for the Blankets for T.O. Care Package Event, during March 2021.

childMarkdownRemark.html: We collaborate with Water.org to provide students with opportunities to socialize with friends, win prizes in games and raffles, and become better informed about homelessness in Toronto and water scarcity around the world.

imagePreview.description: Blankets for TO Logo with snow background

childMarkdownRemark.html: In November 2020, still amid the COVID-19 Pandemic, BTO engaged in a donut distribution initiative while also helping to promote a local small business on campus.

imagePreview.description: A split image of our events in November 2020; Nasir's Hot Dog Stand promotion and our donut distribution initiative.
